entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over Grand Manan Island in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over Grand Manan Island in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
